attributes.action: Christian Bed and Breakfast couple loose court case
attributes.additional_details:
I was lead to believe, this is still a Christian Country.
It is clear in the Bible, GODS WORD, that Homosexuals are an Abonination to God.
And I also was lead to believe Our Queen of England, is still head of the Christian Church.
The Christian Couple, that lost their Court Case, for not letting those " Queers, gays, sleep together.
Should be applauded ,for keeping Gods Standards.
